title: Sainsbury's launch huge Dyson and GTech sale - and the Dyson V6 is now just £50
text:
Get the biggest money stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

In a bid to clear their stores and depots ready for Christmas stock, Sainsbury's have announced a huge vacuum cleaner sale - including lots of Dyson and Gtech.

An array of different models are included in the sales event, including the Dyson V6 Trigger (usually £149.99 ), Gtech AirRam (usually £199.99 ) and V6 Animal (usually £309.99 ) - which will all be slashed to just £50. Madness!

According to a secret source who leaked the information online, the sale is set to start tomorrow, on Wednesday 16th October and will only be available in stores.

The source also included a list of five models and their new prices, which we've compared to Amazon's current price tags below.

However, it's worth noting that Sainsbury's haven't yet confirmed any of the prices below, so things can still change before they're apparently set to go live tomorrow, and none of the below price points are guaranteed.

The source leaked its sacred information to online deals forum HotUKDeals, who wrote "Just got the heads up that Sainsbury's are making massive reductions on a selection of vacuum cleaner stock, including Dyson cordless and Gtech AirRam Prices seem pretty great to be honest!

Insider has said this will be in-store stock only, so best to check out your local store on the day."
description: Leaked information about Sainsbury's cordless vacuum cleaner sale shows major Gtech and Dyson discounts
